title: Lorry driver arrested over the death of 39 migrants ‘passed out’ when he discovered his human cargo, it's claimed
text:
The lorry driver arrested over the death of 39 migrants ‘passed out’ when he discovered his human cargo, it has been claimed.

Mo Robinson was in charge of the lorry as it entered an industrial park in Essex and is being held by police on suspicion of murder.

But friends of the 25-year-old say he is a “gentle giant” who called an ambulance when he realised what was in the back of his trailer.

Essex police have been granted a warrant for the truck driver to be held and questioned for another 24 hours, while officers in Northern Ireland searched his home and that of his parents.

But Francie Donnelly, who has known Robinson for years, said: “This man is my best friend and hasn't got one bad bone in his body.”
description: The lorry driver arrested over the death of 39 migrants ‘passed out’ when he discovered his human cargo, it has been claimed.
